long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A verification code plug-in that automatically recognizes the verification code, and the user can install it through the plug-in store

update log：
1.0.15: Added retransmission mechanism for failed network requests
1.0.16: Set the maximum number of hcaptcha identifications to 30, stop when exceeding
1.0.18: Added the js control function, Add the option of whether to click submit automatically
1.0.21: Added recognition of hcaptcha "click on the head"
1.0.22: Added recognition of hcaptcha "3 choose 1" or "4 choose 1"
1.0.23: Added more recognition status prompts
1.1.0:  Added Funcaptcha automatic recognition
1.1.1:  bug fix 
1.1.2:  bug fix, add funcaptcha offline installation package configuration items
1.1.3:  bug fix 
1.1.4:  bug fix 
1.1.5:  Added funcaptcha support website, fixed some bugs in the recognition process of funcatpcha
1.1.7:  Refactor the recaptcha script, support switching between old and new recaptcha scripts, and fix some bugs in the recognition process of funcaptcha
1.1.8: Add the version number and update reminder, and fix some bugs in the identification process of funcaptcha
1.1.10: Added the "recaptcha js control" function, and added the "configurable auto-submit" function of the new recaptcha script
1.1.11: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of funcaptcha, the offline version added black and white list configuration
1.1.12: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of hcaptcha
1.1.14: “Times limit” is changed to count by tab (the number of times is still recorded when the page is refreshed), and fix some bugs in the recognition process of cloudflare and funcaptcha and recaptcha defaults to new scripts
1.1.15: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of funcaptcha
1.1.16: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of textcaptcha
1.1.17: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of funcaptcha
1.1.18: Add advanced setting
1.1.19: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of hcaptcha
1.1.20: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of textcaptcha
1.1.21: funcaptcha recognition result feedback
1.1.23:  Recaptcha recognition result feedback,Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of funcaptcha
1.1.24: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of funcaptcha
1.1.25: Add network request retry mechanism
1.1.27: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of hcaptcha
1.1.28: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of hcaptcha
1.1.29: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of hcaptcha
1.1.30: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of recaptcha
1.1.32: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of recaptcha
1.1.33: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of recaptcha
1.1.34: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of hecaptcha,Add work stutus flag in context(optional)
1.1.35: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of textcaptcha
1.1.37: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of hcaptcha and textcaptcha
1.1.40: Optimize hcaptcha click canvas action,Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of textcaptcha(in the website mysignins.microsoft.com)
1.1.42:Optimize hcaptcha canvas to allow multiple clicks
1.1.45:Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of recaptcha，Added a retry mechanism for failed requests and fixed bugs on the some website（nexon.com）
1.1.46:Added network timeout mechanism. Added JS control function, and object name can be set in advanced settings
1.1.47:Fix cloudflare click issue，fixed bugs on the some website（nintendo.com）
1.1.48:Fix the bug in funcatpcha recognition, add funcatpcha failure retry configuration drop-down box in advanced settings
1.1.49:In Advanced Settings - General, a js injection configuration is added to control the plugin to inject control objects and working status flags into the js context (enabled by default, if the plugin is detected, try turning this option off)
1.1.50:Encrypt plugin message transmission data to prevent plugin detection
1.1.51:Fixed a bug on the virginmedia.ie website
1.1.52:Fixed textcaptcha recognition bug, fixed hcaptcha canvas recognition bug
1.1.53: Fix hcaptcha canvas recognition bug, add recaptcha single image delay config
1.1.54: Fixed the recaptcha recognition bug on carousell.com, and Fixed the hcaptcha canvas can't be clicked in h5 mode
1.1.55: Added recaptcha single image waiting time configuration, adapted to recaptcha invisible mode (configurable)
1.1.56: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of hcaptcha(Correct the size of uploaded images)
1.1.57: Fixed some bugs in the recognition process of recaptcha(4X4mode)
1.1.58: Solve the problem of hcaptcha recognition process stuck
long.zh_CN:
一个验证码自动识别填写的插件，用户可通过插件商店安装

更新日志：
1.0.15：增加了网络请求失败重传机制
1.0.16：设置一次hcaptcha识别最多次数为30，超过停止
1.0.18：增加了js控制功能，增加了是否自动点击提交的选项
1.0.21：增加对hcaptcha“点击头部”的识别
1.0.22：增加对hcaptcha“三选一”或“四选一”的识别
1.0.23：新增了更多的识别状态提示
1.1.0：新增加了funcaptcha自动识别
1.1.1：修复一些bug
1.1.2：修复一些bug，增加funcaptcha的离线安装包配置项
1.1.3：修复一些bug
1.1.4：修复一些bug
1.1.5：增加了funcaptcha的支持网站，修复了funcatpcha在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.7：重构recaptcha代码，支持新旧recaptcha脚本切换，修复了funcaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.8：界面增加版本号并增加更新提醒，修复了funcaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.10: 增加了“recaptcha js控制”功能，增加了新recaptcha脚本的“可配置自动提交”的功能
1.1.11: 修复了funcaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug，离线版本增加了黑白名单的配置
1.1.12: 修复了hcaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.14: “次数限制”功能改为按照tab计数（刷新页面仍记录次数），修复了cloudflare，funcaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug，recaptcha默认为新脚本
1.1.15: 修复了funcaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.16: 修复了文字验证码在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.17: 修复了funcaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.18: 增加了高级设置功能
1.1.19: 修复了hcaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.20: 修复了文字验证码在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.21: funcaptcha识别结果反馈
1.1.23: recaptcha识别结果反馈，修复了funcaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.24: 修复了funcaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.25: 增加网络请求重试机制
1.1.27: 修复了hcaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.28: 修复了hcaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.29: 修复了hcaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.30: 修复了recaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.32: 修复了recaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.33: 修复了recaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.34: 修复了hecaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug，在上下文中添加工作状态标志（可选）
1.1.35: 修复了文字验证码在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.37: 修复了文字验证码和hecaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug
1.1.40: 优化hcaptcha点击canvas的动作流程,修复在mysignins.microsoft.com这个网站的文字验证码识别bug
1.1.42: hcaptcha优化，使画布能够多次点击
1.1.45: 修复了recaptcha识别过程中的一些bug，增加了请求失败的重试机制以及修复了部分网站（nexon.com）的bug
1.1.46: 增加网络超时机制。增加JS控制功能，可在高级设置中设置对象名
1.1.47: 修复cloudflare点击问题，修复nintendo.com recaptcha自动点击问题
1.1.48: 修复funcatpcha运行bug，在高级设置中增加funcatpcha失败重试配置下拉框
1.1.49: 在高级设置-通用中，增加了js注入配置，用于控制插件将控制对象和工作状态flag注入到js上下文中（默认开启，如果插件被检测，请尝试关闭这个选项）
1.1.50: 加密插件消息传输数据，防止插件被检测
1.1.51: 修复了网站virginmedia.ie的bug
1.1.51: 修复了textcaptcha识别bug，修复了hcaptcha的canvas识别bug
1.1.52: 修复textcaptcha识别bug，修复hcaptcha canvas识别bug
1.1.53: 修复hcaptcha canvas识别bug, 增加recaptcha单图延迟设置
1.1.54: 修复在carousell.com的recaptcha识别bug，修复在h5模式下hcaptcha canvas无法点击的bug
1.1.55: 增加recaptcha单图等待时间配置，适配recaptcha的invisible模式（可配置）
1.1.56: 修复了hcaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug（上传图像的尺寸）
1.1.57: 修复了recaptcha在识别过程中的一些bug（4X4模式）
1.1.58: 修复了hcaptcha识别过程卡住的问题
